item.description:
Comedy Series!


In Topside at the Officers' Club, Naval Station Newport

Shows start at 7 p.m., but we need to arrive by 6 to get a table.  The place gets packed!

IMPORTANT - This event is open to active duty personnel, retirees, reservists, eligible family members, DoD employees and contractors with base access only. So, if you do not fit in one of these categories, unfortunately you cannot attend.

Please email Lisa with questions or comments.

As always, if you RSVP please show up and if you can't make it, please update your RSVP. Subject to cancellation if not enough people have RSVP'd.


Wednesday, February 13 - Joe Devito

Free show!!!

Comics are geared for adult entertainment, some word choices are not family friendly.
item.how_to_find_us: Lisa will be in Topside at Officer's Club
item.name: Free Comedy Night on Naval Station Newport!
